item.description: About Kenku Bard. Now works in the Tavern of Forever
About MIA
About Killed by Granny
About A Orc Blood Hunter now Military Advisor for the Cradle Snatchers
About Hill Dwarf Barbarian. Asended to a god after a trail infront of the Dwarven Gods.
About MIA

item.title: Archibald
item.description: Archibald About Has a tattoo of a octopus with 8 guns on his butt Works for the Ministry of Information under Felis Flukneedle who is at the moment located at the northern garrison.

item.title: Blossom
item.description: Blossom About [[Breeze]]’s sister Suffering from a illness. Works as a painter/scullary maid for Minister Rabaniar

item.title: Breeze
Brior
item.description: Brior - DEAD Adorable minotaur who was a guard at the Hopes Lament in the Thyme Wastes. He is mute as payment for running way from the prision.

item.title: Canus
item.description: Canus About Dead like anus - Qidan

item.title: Corellien
item.description: Corellien About Avatar of the god of magic. Located at Stronghold - Master of secrets. Has died and been ressurected.

item.description: Cosine About Mech from the mech releam former Pirate of the Astral Sea

item.title: Dominus Oraculum
item.description: Dominus Oraculum Book made out of human flesh found by Naberus One shall come and 3 shall hide and all dwarves shall kneel when she does arise.

item.title: Du Pontif's
item.description: Du Pontif’s About Vamipre kin from Bathumhold. Well know traders of trinkets and hard to find items Members Lucinda Du Pontif Nathanial Du Pontif Vampire Children (Annoying shits) Events Offered us a Ring of Misspelling

item.description: Elunore City Of The Elves And home of my dear friend Naberus

item.title: Fang
item.description: Fang (8) Teenage fang has got a massive WANG (8) About Little Wolf kin / Fully grown wolfkin due to a time crystal and branching paths.

item.title: General Howlington
item.description: General Howlington “Insemination in the Ranks” About Lead the attack on Ghost against The Marquis. Aggressive but pat-able

item.title: Ghost
item.description: Ghost About Bordered by a ravine. Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead? A vengeful paladin?

item.title: Granny
item.description: Granny About Leader of a Hag coven of three (all bar one is dead name to be confirmed) Geralt of Rivania used to be a servant of Granny Dead

item.title: Innadel
item.description: Innadel Churches Large Church to the Eldath in the center of a farming town Taverns The Boil and Youth Locations Badger Hill Cute little hillside with a taxidermy badger outside owner is Percival

item.title: La Qua
item.description: La Qua About DEAD - Badger Hill by Archibald Most wanted in [[Mytz]] BUT BUT BUT WHAT ABOUT THE MANNERISMS

item.title: Lady Ravana
item.description: Lady Ravanna About The face of The Syndicate AKA “The Lady of the long night” The puppet queen Mystress of Shadows Malice General Bad-bitch The Raven Queen(?

item.title: Lady Xiao
item.description: Lady Xiao About Full name: Simia Xiao Member of The Syndicate Has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items like a monkey Events Trapped us at badger hill We have to sneakily get into her mansion Other Archibald has a connection to her (hit list?

item.title: Madame Porkus
item.description: Madame Porkus - DEAD Fullname: Madame Porkus - the Cruel Scientist and researcher of the weird and wonderful has had a hand in the creation of Qidan Soon to be Dead

item.description: Morie Destroyer of Worlds About A talking skull met at Ghost now worn on winters belt “Evil in the sense that he is undead but not actually evil”

item.title: Myts
item.description: Myts About Technological City. High poverty line contains slums. Large Lenses and cool locomotive carriage Leadership Minister Rabaniar the new leader of the Ministry of Information

item.title: Naberus
item.description: About Class Eldrich Knight - Warforge Notes Obsessed with dick Believes he is still an elf

item.title: Ofheise
item.description: Ofheise About Gem of Aeresia Main market district of the continent Taverns The Golden Lion Posh Charity is the bartender They have coconut rum from Rauthei from a rabbit kin Events Ellianas was kidnapped by Granny Met Raffles the talking weasle

item.title: Percival
item.description: Percival About Owner of Badger Hill Pug boy Caretaker of Griffins New member of the Stronghold

item.title: Pibbles
item.description: Pibbles About Fey Creature - Adorable Appearance Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help

item.title: Pigwings
item.description: Pigwings About Met in the plane of insanity Had a dead cat, bat, camel and fish as a pet Dead Events Used a grande to kill a member of the royalty with in the plane of insantiy Documents came to light that Pigwings was a secret agent man (more clarity needed)

item.title: Pink Panther
item.description: Pink Panther About Butler of the Stronghold usually accompained by the Pink Panther theme. Totally bad ass in combat.

item.title: Players
item.description: List of Players List of all players from spooks campaign Active Players Daria Winter Archibald Qidan Ex-Players Batflap Blue Ellianas Geralt of Rivania Mardred Blutgard Naberus Sigma

item.title: Portobello Pete
item.description: Portobello Pete About Mushoom being. Used to hang around corpses of dark rituals Best Friend of Qidan. Likely a stoner vision or imaginary friend.

item.title: Prelate Jinelar
item.description: Prelate Jinelar About Dragonborn with the ability to invade and communicate through dreams. Member of the Brotherhood of the Resplendent Skin One of the organisations fighting The Syndicate I think this is a NPC but could be a new character

item.title: Qidan
item.description: Qidan About Class - Spore Druid From - Ofheise Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of Ofheise was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation.

item.title: Ratkin
item.description: Ratkin About I think they are dead lol

item.title: Rauthei
item.description: Rauthei About Home of the rabbit kin

item.title: Rillathane
item.description: Rillathane About Member of The Syndicate Avatar of Nature Dead - Killed by the Cradle Snatchers

item.title: Saraki
item.description: Saraki About Lord of the Dark Elves. Dead Member of The Syndicate Events Caused a massive rift bringing deamons and nightmare fuel into Elunore when a vote for War on Cradle

item.title: Session 1
item.description: Session 1 Innadel or Leradel Arrived at Innadel Met Breeze Went to the local tavern and question Breeze who was suspicious Archie notices guards outside the church Qidan scouts as a Bat We go and investigate FOR NO REASON EXCEPT NOSY Hostage situation Big fight Find letter with Black Seal with a monkey on From The Syndicate initiating the church into the fold Told to meet at Badger Hill Go to Badger Hill Get trapped by Lady Xiao CLIFFHANGER

item.title: Session 10
item.description: Session 10 Rave 1 v 1 (Daria Vs Romanof) Daria fucking owned Romanof She is so broken… Romanof says he will clear the West side of the wall at Sunset Melon Orgy The poet is melon inspired from the melon orgy and is writting sonnets and odes to melon.

item.title: Session 11
item.description: Session 11 Waking up in the desert RING RING its you Motorola Sending Stone Breeze and other have arrived and will be made to work for there keep Myts first regiment has been mobilised for Archi Plots many ways to kill them Using our Vampire and Werewolf army Taking over the prison and trap them Avoiding them all We still need to talk about this Talking about hopes lament Rumour of the woman in black arriving at the prison and taking over in a blink of a eye.

item.title: Session 12
item.description: Session 12 In the Warden’s Office and on to PorkyPorcus We have been there for a while, I remained as a rat while the other members of the party tried to be all big boss scary.

item.title: Session 13
item.description: Session 13 I was delierious from Covid so my notes may not be as complete. Battle of Porkus and the Searching the Room So we do the deed, notable point Daria is blinded during the battle but still cannot be hit and takes out two dogs in the process.

item.title: Session 14
item.description: Session 14 I didnt write too much for this so I am going off memory. I got distracted by all the romance in the air.

item.title: Session 2
item.description: Session 2 Badger Hill mages start filling the holes with CloudKill Rescue the hippogriffs and Percival

item.title: Session 3
item.description: Session 3 Fang - used crystal, lasted for a week, but wolfkin had gone when he had got back Reigning lady of Mitts High tea society fleeing - covered in dust - to the south

item.title: Session 4
item.description: Session 4 Questioning Morie Destroyer of Worlds Attacked by Zombie lake boys Daria turns into a red mist after nearly dying mainly to friendly fire “you are in my domain” - CROW AND RAT unsure if they are in the same voice A wall of flesh fight Met a Wolfkin fighting, he said he can lead us to The Matron Daria intimidated Rico who is a Wolfkin warrior Met General Howlington Older Fang has a big EGO and has headed to fight The Marquis against the General’s orders

item.title: Session 5
item.description: Session 5 We are gonna attack Dark Haven and get fang back “by Gorm yes” We need to make a alliance with the Vampires in Bathumhold (The Du Pontif’s) to attack Dark Haven Old Wolf - Small Hovel, in Ellingville Quag, supply crates have gone missing which has health potions in Head to Bathumhold with Twink Wolfkin scout, no name needed he is too cute Travel through the tunnel Walrus fight.

item.title: Session 6
item.description: Session 6 Questioning rico about the sniper It is from Ofheise (maybe there is a bang stick shop there?

item.title: Session 7
item.description: Session 7 Dominus Oraculum number 3 came true Get a phoenix circlet Everyone wants to sell it I want it We get 30 Wolves We get 10 Vampire Total Cost 1.

item.title: Session 8
item.description: Session 8 After the murder of Lady Xiao Daria Went back to the slums She monitored the local tarvern to see if any authorities come Barricades and blimps monitor the city of Myts The door of the tavern opens and closes Winter

item.title: Session 9
item.description: Session 9 Go Back to breeze Attacked by Assassins which breeze suggested he should leave and he did. WE FORGOT THE NOTE the assassin left.

item.description: Tavern of Forever A between realm bar which have connections to all parts of the multiverse.

item.description: Teleport Locations Ofheise in Naberus' lab Ghost Just outside of Myts

item.title: The Marquis
item.description: The Marquis About DEAD Member of The Syndicate Rackshasa Lich Hearsay Wolfkin Has a beak but not Arrakoa Can control animals Is a Rackshasa Resides with in the capital city of Ghost Vampires believe it is a Lich

item.title: The Matron
item.description: The Matron About [[Fang]]’s Mother. Banged by Naberus

item.title: Thyme Wastes
item.description: Thyme Wastes About Desert Area containing a prison. Locations Hope’s Lament - Prison a member has put themselves into prison and we have to investigate why

item.title: Unknowns
